label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug in redis-cli to handle unknown endpoints in cluster mode, ensuring proper redirection when the cluster-preferred-endpoint-type is unknown.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Ensured that the function load timeout is disabled during loading from RDB/AOF and on replicas.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Fixed a false success and a memory leak for ACL selector with incorrect parenthesis combinations.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed an assertion issue when script timeout occurred after signaling a blocked client.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Updated the MONITOR client's memory correctly for INFO and client-eviction.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug where the response of cluster nodes was unnecessarily adding an extra comma when no hostname is present.
